ModMetaData.name: Duty Tally
ModMetaData.author: mrclrchtr
ModMetaData.description:
Keep your colony running smoothly with Duty Tally!
This lightweight mod adds a Job Count column to the Work tab, showing exactly how many work types each colonist is assigned. No more guessing who’s overworked or underutilized — manage your pawns’ workload with precision.
Features: ✅ Instant Overview: See assigned job counts at a glance. ✅ Sortable Column: Organize colonists by workload (or laziness!). ✅ Vanilla-Friendly: Seamlessly integrates with RimWorld’s UI. ✅ Zero Performance Impact: Runs efficiently, even in massive colonies.
"The Overseer’s best friend since 5500."
